attributes.title: ONE STAR!!!
attributes.review: This app drains your battery and needs you location, possibly to get you, I don’t recommend. AND it sells your info. Don’t get itttt!!!!

attributes.title: Never again!
attributes.review: I got this app and then I was immediately disappointed! Instead of trump a large and racist orange sat in his place!😤

attributes.title: worst app i’ve ever downloaded
attributes.review: i was so excited to download an app for my beloved donald trump, but was heartbroken to find out it wouldn’t even run. i was so excited to see the orange cheeto man run his mouth :,( i even heard he was going to be taking down that god awful app tik tok! if anything that app should be dying not this one!

attributes.title: disappointed
attributes.review: someone told me that I could watch porn here and needless to say, I was very disappointed...

attributes.title: PRIVACY
attributes.review: This app took the personal information from my phone and put it in the app! Total violation of my constitutional rights!

attributes.title: traumatizing
attributes.review: this is the worst app to ever be invented. i clicked on the app and the 'welcoming' screen told me to kill myself and jump off a bridge because no one loves me and never will. i don't recommend. also why would this racist, misogynistic, sexist, xenophobic rapist make an app. for what. what was the purpose of this app? anywho dont download

attributes.title: Bad app😡😡
attributes.review: I hate this app this appp soo. Ugh it steals all your data and it takes away all you content and it’s so low quality👎🏿👎🏿

attributes.title: Lags phone
attributes.review: This app is slow and sometimes unresponsive

attributes.title: Why
attributes.review: I don’t know why i even bought the app it totally wasn’t even worth it
